# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position: -28.0, -61.0)
- Collection wooden chest (position: -27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (position: -26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (position: -25.0, -59.0)
- Output burner inserter (position: -23.5, -58.5)
- Storage wooden chest (position: -22.5, -58.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position: -18.0, -53.0)
- Collection wooden chest (position: -17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (position: -16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (position: -15.0, -51.0)
- Output burner inserter (position: -13.5, -50.5)
- Storage wooden chest (position: -12.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position: 41.0, -82.0)
- Collection wooden chest (position: 41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter (position: 41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position: -4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (position: -4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (position: -3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups (fluid systems 4322, 4330)
- Electricity network (id: 7638) connecting various entities

### Science Pack Production Setup
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position: 8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest (position: 5.5, 13.5)
- Input inserter (position: 6.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (position: 11.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter (position: 10.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Lab for research

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items from storage
- Verify that the target chest contains the required items before attempting extraction
- Check storage chest inventory contents before attempting to extract specific items

### Errors when inserting items
- Ensure you have the required items in inventory before attempting to insert them
- Check fuel levels of machines before attempting to add more fuel

### Production line issues
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in all burner devices (mining drills, inserters, furnaces)
- Ensure mining drills are properly positioned over ore patches
- Verify the complete production chain is working (mining → smelting → assembly)
- Check that collection chests are properly positioned at mining drill output positions

### Resource shortages
- Monitor assembling machine ingredient levels to prevent production stoppages
- Maintain adequate copper plate and iron gear wheel supply for science pack production
- Keep coal supply steady for all burner-based equipment
